body:
The way a victim of a violent crime who lived with the attacker before 1 October 1979 can claim compensation has changed.

For more information, visit [Claim compensation if you were the victim of a violent crime](https://www.gov.uk/claim-compensation-criminal-injury/victim-lived-with-attacker-before-october-1979).
heading: Apply for criminal injuries compensation
lede: This form is no longer in use.
